net.tridentsdk.world

Interface WeatherConditions


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface WeatherConditions
    Obtains the state of the weather, and allows control of the Weather in a world
    Since:
    0.4-alpha
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRaining()
      Checks if it is raining in a world
      boolean isSunny()
      Whether or not any weather is occurring within the world
      boolean isThundering()
      Checks if it is thundering in a world
      int rainTime()
      Gets the number of ticks before raining is toggled
      void setRaining(boolean raining)
      Sets raining to the provided boolean
      void setSunny()
      Sets the world to sunny, stopping both thundering and raining if present
      void setThundering(boolean thundering)
      Sets thundering to the boolean provided
      int thunderTime()
      Gets the number of ticks before thundering is toggled
      void toggleRain(int ticks)
      Toggles raining within the world
      void toggleThunder(int ticks)
      Toggles thundering within the world

    • Method Detail

      • isRaining

        boolean isRaining()
        Checks if it is raining in a world
        Returns:
        True if it is raining in a world

      • rainTime

        int rainTime()
        Gets the number of ticks before raining is toggled
        Returns:
        The number of ticks before raining is toggled

      • toggleRain

        void toggleRain(int ticks)
        Toggles raining within the world
        Parameters:
        ticks - the ticks until the next rain toggle, or 0 to toggle immediately

      • setRaining

        void setRaining(boolean raining)
        Sets raining to the provided boolean
        Parameters:
        raining - true to start raining, false to stop

      • isThundering

        boolean isThundering()
        Checks if it is thundering in a world
        Returns:
        True if it is thundering in a world

      • thunderTime

        int thunderTime()
        Gets the number of ticks before thundering is toggled
        Returns:
        The number of ticks before thundering is toggled

      • toggleThunder

        void toggleThunder(int ticks)
        Toggles thundering within the world
        Parameters:
        ticks - the amount of ticks until the next thunder toggle, 0 to toggle immediately

      • setThundering

        void setThundering(boolean thundering)
        Sets thundering to the boolean provided
        Parameters:
        thundering - true to start thundering, false to stop

      • isSunny

        boolean isSunny()
        Whether or not any weather is occurring within the world
        Returns:
        true if no weather is occurring, false if it is

      • setSunny

        void setSunny()
        Sets the world to sunny, stopping both thundering and raining if present
